item.title: Hong Kong tower blocks fire death toll rises to 128
item.description: Authorities say 89 bodies are unidentified and 79 people remain injured after Wednesday's blaze.

item.title: Trump says US will pause migration from 'third-world countries'
item.description: The president did not name which countries would be affected, but vowed to remove anyone "not a net asset" to the US.

item.title: Ukraine anti-corruption agents search home of Zelensky's top adviser
item.description: Andriy Yermak has played a crucial role in Ukraine's response to Russia's war and is lead negotiator in peace talks.

item.title: Two former Peruvian presidents jailed in two days
item.description: Pedro Castillo and Mart√≠n Vizcarra are the latest in a series of Peruvian presidents to be sent to prison.

item.title: Runaway nuns can stay in Alpine convent if they leave social media
item.description: The three nuns say they were taken out of the convent against their will and placed in a care home.
